title: Justin M. Jacobs, Xinjiang and the Modern Chinese State (U. Washington Press, 2016)
description:
Justin M. Jacob‘s new book proposes that we understand modern China as a national empire, and traces the strategies of difference that have consistently marked Xinjiang as a part thereof. Xinjiang and the Modern Chinese State (University of Washington Press, 2016) guides readers through a history of the institutions and...
